website_summaries.verdict: A quality moisturizing lipstick with natural ingredients at a bargain price point.
pros: Has a smooth, satin finish – perfect for creating more subtle looks
Infused with natural ingredients like Vitamin E, raspberry seed oil, beeswax, and more
Sits at a low price point
cons: Colors are not overly pigmented, more of a sheer look

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT--DON'T BUY ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Burt's Bee's line--but do not buy them off of Amazon!! I've bought several on Amazon as well as in store, and the ones in store have kept just fine, while the ones (even in different colors) that I bought off Amazon get bumpy and weird! Yuck! Buy these lipsticks (they're GREAT)--just NOT on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Moore

customer_reviews.title: My lips are happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have every other Burts Bees lip product so I thought I would try the new lipstick. I have fair skin so thought Blush Basin might work for me. It does! It's a very soft dusty pink, not too matte and not greasy looking either. It's a bit deeper than my natural lip color which I like. So far it's lasted a few hours and looks great! Worth the money and I will buy again! Another Winner from Burts Bees!
customer_reviews.author: P. Colander

customer_reviews.title: As someone that hates lipstick.. I really like this one..
customer_reviews.text: Best lipstick I've tried in ages. The color is as I expected (and exactly what I wanted) and it goes on nicely, smooth and even with good (though not heavy) coloring. I do have to reapply often, and it does come off a bit on glasses when fresh - but I don't feel that plasticy grease most lipsticks leave behind nor have any strange taste. I hope this colorway is a permanent line as I finally have a lipstick I use.
customer_reviews.author: LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The color is very cute but that's the only thing I liked about it...it said it was prime but took 19 days to get. when it finally arrived I opened the package and put 1 gentle swipe on my lips, I immediately noticed the texture was awfel I looked at the lipstick and noticed it had in 1 swipe turned from smooth amd creamy to bumpy and gritty. This is clearly an old tube of lipstick I recall the same issue happening when Burt's Bees first released their lip line but since then they've updated their formula and I haven't noticed this so this has to be old stock. I am very disappointed and would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: catherine sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great color and price, but develops weird bumps after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I love this color and I'm happy to not be spending $15/tube like I used to for Clinique (I had to switch when they stopped making my Double Fudge color -- Russet River is a close match!). However like other reviewers have noted, every time the top of the lipstick develops a rough bumpy surface after a couple of months, which makes it go on unevenly and feel weird. I have NOT left it in high heat or any other conditions that could have caused this. The one downside to this great lipstick -- I'm looking for a substitute now. :(
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick Burt’s Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lipstick, Wine Wave, it has a lot of small lumps. I never had any lipstick with lump in it. I cannot return because I already used it. I do not suggest to buy this color, it's lumpy it's just a waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: Maria Paz Jose-Parker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COLOR AND GREAT PRODUCT - no noticeable scent and very flattering
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT COLOR - pinkish fuchsia. Not a deep fuchsia color - very soft but enough fuchsia to complement my burgundy hair. Lots of compliments from friends. LOVE LOVE LOVE it. Also, i'm over 50 so very dark lipstick is unflatternig on me. This give a bit of a splash of color without going overboard. Also, no offensive taste whatsoever. I'm super sensitive and I don't even know I"m wearing it. I'm a huge fan. Once I ordered one that had some pieces of sand or grit in it but I hadn't bought that one on Amazon (got it at a major pharmacy chain) and I didn't bother returning it. But I've had this 6 times since and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Notmartha

customer_reviews.title: Scam used products
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this item, and as Soon as I opened it I’ve noticed that it’s been USED and it’s not new, I saw the traces of another lip !!!!! it’s been put back in a way to show that it hasn’t been opened!!!! This is terrible I’m throwing this away because I cannot return it!!!! What a waste of money!!!! Please be careful this is dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Very Bad Quality - Seems like lipstick is very old and expired
customer_reviews.text: It feels like this seller bought a bunch of expired Burt Bees and resold them. My lipstick is super clumpy, even if you try to smooth it out with your finger or something it just clumps onto your finger and everything else hahaha. It's terrible and I love Burt Bees! I recommend purchasing from a retail store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light pink color. Would look absolutely gorgeous on fair skin. It looks nice on medium skin. I did not find the lipstick as hydrating as I was expecting it to be. It's definitely not drying. But if you're prone to dry lips, you will still need to use lip balms at night etc. The color holds up well but requires touch up after food/drink. I will try some other shades given the good experience with this one. Great price for organic product.
customer_reviews.author: Nakstrani

customer_reviews.title: but I have to say once I received it I was extremely happy. The lipstick wasn’t super she’s but not super ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what I was actually going to get with this lipstick when I ordered it whether it was going to be sheer or opaque or going to be more red or more pink, but I have to say once I received it I was extremely happy. The lipstick wasn’t super she’s but not super opaque either, it had more of a buildable color to it. It was hard to tell whether it was more pink or more red frankly because depending on how many time you apply it’s dark or light. I love it and I think it can keep a natural look natural or even be a part of a more dramatic look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dark red shade, but takes more care when applying than other shades of the same lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lipstick in the blush basin shade. It felt very moisturizing and looked good no matter how light or heavy I applied it. Unfortunately, for whatever reason, this shade doesn’t feel nearly as moisturizing. I actually feel I need chapstick in addition to the lipstick. I have to apply it all over fairly heavily to get a good coat, then dab it off to get the look I want. That said, the shade looks dark and natural at the same time and is a good, dark shade of red. I think it would be flattering on anyone (personally, I have ivory skin with yellow undertones, and most reds look weirdly orange on me. This shade looked good!)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but packaging and/or manufacturing needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: First order arrived with lipstick fully extended up into the lid which damaged the product. Replacement, arrived today in a big box by itself with no cushioning. When I removed the cap this time the whole lipstick fell in my lap as it too was fully extended inside the cap. Very strange that this would happen on two different orders. I will keep but would have preferred not to have lipstick stain on my sweater that I will have to try and remove.
customer_reviews.author: DebraDale Designs

customer_reviews.title: Color was as-advertised in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: From reading other reviews, I decided to purchase a slightly darker color than originally intended. I chose Russet River, and yes, it can be as dark as advertised with an extra coat or two. A thin layer looks nice, but does wear off quickly. I'm not unhappy with this lipstick, but I will go with a lighter color in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Bert's Bees or nothing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge makeup person, different era, I learned how to put on makeup in the back of the school bus from other poor farm girls like myself. The new gen YouTube make up tutorials are lost on me, but I'm trying to learn. I've used all sorts of brands of makeup over the years, but no more. From now on its Bert's Bees or nothing. Its lightweight, doesn't irritate my skin (sensitive), and I barely realize I'm wearing anything. The fact that its 99% all natural is a huge bonus. They have a lot of different colors and products. I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy on your skin
customer_reviews.text: This goes on so easily, and with the natural ingredients, I don't worry about skin cancer. The colors are also flattering. The prices are also very good for the quality. It would be better if Burt's would not use plastic containers, which will end in a landfill. Hopefully, this company will find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: ECWB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible texture after only one use
customer_reviews.text: The picture isn't the greatest to show the gritty texture but this is the second time in the Satin lipstick I've tried and both developed a gritty texture after one use which feels horrible on your lips. I read on the Burt's Bees website that many people were having the same problem but that it had been reformulated. Apparently not. I won't try another one.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not lipstick,tinted lip balm is more like it
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a lip balm than lipstick.the color is very faint and not pigmented. It is very moisturizering. If you a re looking for a tinted lip balm, then this will work great. Otherwise, I do not suggest this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tandiwrites

customer_reviews.title: Not hydrating at all. Dry on your dry lips
customer_reviews.text: Horrible there is nothing in it for hydrating lips. Made my wife's lips more dry. Horrible because can't send it back after she opened and used it 1 x
customer_reviews.author: Carnal C

customer_reviews.title: Richly pigmented, natural color.
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried many Burt's Bees products, and have gone through many different Burt's Bees lip colors. I have settled upon the Orchid Ocean lipstick as my favorite. I love how richly pigmented it is and it is easy to control how much color I want. I dab a small amount on my lips and it transfers a beautiful and wearable shade of orchid. It's gorgeous. The color is more long lasting than the other shades I have tried as well. I will absolutely continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Spider

customer_reviews.title: Like lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but how it's been advertised is questionable. It seems all advertisers have to throw in some myth when really they'd be better off just stating the facts. I haven't tried the matte lipsticks but the other lipsticks I can tell you are like lip glosses and the photos really do no justice in describing its color. Each color will definitely be dependent upon the skin tone. Moisturizing, nice colors, but it's lip gloss and does not last that long. But I'm okay with that and I like this product. They could have done better on the case design.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: So good, yes!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this color! I found it at Whole Foods, and then saw that amazon (although technically the same company) had it for much cheaper! Delivery was prompt (as always with Amazon prime), and I have never been so happy with a lipstick. It is definitely not the same as chapstick, I put chapstick on over often. It’s a matte finish. It lasts for hours. Obvious motions like eating, drinking, or smoking are going to make the lipstick wear faster, obviously, but the lipstick also tints your lips. So, even when the bold color is gone your lips are still tinted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ruby Ripple - Very Flattering Color!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been eyeing these lipsticks for a while before I realized I could get them via Subscibe & Save! I chose Ruby Ripple, & it's a very pretty color that's flattering to my complexion - I have very fair skin - I usually have to but the porcelain shade of foundation, with chesnut colored hair & green eyes - Ruby Ripple is FANTASTIC for me!!! I will definitely repurchase this lipstick!!! And, yes, I would recommend is line of lipsticks to a friend!!!
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeReading

customer_reviews.title: Not blended well, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This 'lipstick' is a thicker version of the other Burt's Bees tinted lip balm, but it isn't blended right. After using a few times, little dark spots of the coloring agent showed up in the stick and on the lips. I was always brushing away little grains of dark color. Got tired of that and tossed it. Wouldn't waste my money on this. Also, the color is gone altogether in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: One More Time

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love this neutral nude color. I have a lot of natural pigment in my lips, and this tones it down a bunch and is just really flattering (I'm fair skinned, with olive undertones, gray eyes). It wears well and isn't super drying, but I wouldn't call it moisturizing, either. I usually wear chapstick underneath. It doesn't last too long, but I don't expect it to. Just a nice, natural lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this lipstick! It’s all natural and the colors are so pretty. It’s also very moisturizing. I usually avoid lipstick because my lips get all dry and they peel along with the lipstick and it looks awful. Some even get slimy. This lipstick is the opposite. It keeps my lips smooth and moisturized and it looks great! It doesn’t stay when eating/kissi but it isn’t marketed to do that, so I say it definitely lives up to expectation! Give it a try :)
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Was not the color advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not look like the color advertised. ..it was too light and frosty, but it was moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Being that I don't like to wear makeup, it doesn't really much matter to me if it comes off when I eat or drink something. It's on my lips, so it's going to come off. Just reapply it. I do enjoy Burt's Bees products in general, and this is no exception. I enjoy the Lily Lake and Berry colors because they look good even if I don't wear anything else, which is normally the case. The only thing about this transaction that I thought was weird was how large of an envelope they used for it. It came in good condition, wasn't melted or dented or "off" in any way, so that's good. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Its ok and the berry color is pretty. But the lipstick itself is bumpy like others had shown in pictures but seems to go on smooth. It does have to be reapplied often and comes off very easily, which is annoying. I probably wouldn't purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Laurielane17

customer_reviews.title: Smells Old/Tastes Perfumey
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled foul and tastes perfumey and artificial, kind of like it was old and the ingredients went bad, very different from other Burt’s Bees lipsticks I’ve purchased in the past. Maybe that’s why this color was so much cheaper than the others...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick was used!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this lipstick since I was looking for something moisturizing and neutral in color. I was so disappointed to open the lipstick and see that it was smudged around the base in multiple areas and the top was uneven and out of shape. Beware if you’re buying this “new” from Amazon it will most likely be a used item their trying to pass off as new. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: jreed11

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Russet river is beautiful! I was worried about it looking too brown, but it actually looks like a dark burgundy on my lips (brown/purple). It worked well for my desert dry lips, didn't make them more dry and is definitely moisturizing! Staying power is meh (comes off pretty much immediately if your lips touch anything), but it isn't advertised as long lasting, so can't complain too much about that. Overall a good lipstick that I'd be happy to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good color...
customer_reviews.text: I received a tube that had the lipstick broken off in cap...can’t really use...not eligible for return. Might have been old product.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaB

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: When I receive this item, this one already broken . But this is not returnable item.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy case, light lipstick colors - good feeling on lips.
customer_reviews.text: Burt's Bees Trio was a great idea. I wish the color of the lipstick was darker. I must say that I think the cost is a little high. But considering the heavy container and mirror, I can see why they charge so much. This container is very heavy and would not be good to put in a purse and logically there is no need to have this at home; especially with a mirror on it. The products are nice and has the good stuff for the lips. It feels good. I would suggest to buy these items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ann BN

customer_reviews.title: Love Burt's Bees
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these perfect lipsticks. I have been a fan of Burt's Bees for years, but just discovered this lipstick. I'm very fussy about the shade I wear and, LOW and BEHOLD, I found my color in a rich, smooth lipstick, called BURT'S BEES!!! Thank you, great service, great product....oh, love the lipstick case also...very different!
customer_reviews.author: Linda/Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Second one that's smudged in as many weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Okay with the first one I bought back in February. Maybe it's the warm weather but this is the second one that came out smudge when rolling it up. We'll have to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not like Blush Basin color, as I feel it is the wrong shade for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Blush Basin color based on other reviews about how natural and neutral-looking it was. First of all this lipstick formula is creamy. However, I don't like Blush Basin color. I feel it is a whitish pink and perhaps the wrong shade for my skin tone. It is classified as a "nude" on the Burt's Bees color chart. However, I don't feel it is a color that looks natural on me.
customer_reviews.author: Funnygirl2013

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. I got lipstick without any package at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I got lipstick without any package at all. Lipstick broken inside and no wonder, lipstick is very weak. Terrible smell. On the lips feel like some cheap lipstick almost like Vaseline. Not persistent. I threw away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: I've never tried BB's lipstick but like some of their other products
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried BB's lipstick but like some of their other products. It's a little lighter than expected based on just seeing it online, so next time I'll get a darker one. However, it's very nice, a full sized lipstick, and it's very creamy and moisturizing as stated, so you don't need chapstick under it or gloss over it. Compared to other lipsticks, it only has a light pleasant scent. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smooth lipstick; nude color
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is much lighter than is shown in the picture. It is a light nude color that is pretty in the tube, but looks absolutely horrible on me. The consistency is nice and creamy; color stays put for a long time. I have also used this as a light blush, and it works nicely for that. So, I give it a four out of five, only because the color looks so bad on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Dettmann

customer_reviews.title: love this lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. It has quickly become my go to lipstick. I have olive skin and it is a perfect barbie doll pink for my skin tone. My little blonde 4 year old also loves to wear this lipstick and i often find her in my purse searching for it ;) Which is fine by me, as I know it doesn't have any toxic ingredients in it.
customer_reviews.author: smcg

customer_reviews.title: Ok lipsrick, not the best
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to see an actual burt’s bees lipsticks. I read the reviews and decided to only get one to try. Is ok, but think i would stick with the tinted lip balm which is much smoother and creamier. This lipstick is ok. I use it over a lipstain. Even tho it isn’t creamy, at least it doesn’t smear everywhere!! I’m sure I’ll use it all, but doubt I will re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisterizer
customer_reviews.text: This is first time I ordered this product and would have given it 5 stars. I absolutely loved it until half way through the stick, it became very grainy like there was sand in it. I sliced a thin layer off to see if it would help but it didn't so I did it again and it was the same graininess through the end of the tube. Half the tube was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Toiannette1

customer_reviews.title: I like the color though
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with NO protection. it lay in the box along with other items I purchased, without bubble wrap. without ANY protection. when I opened the lipstick, the "listick" itself was in its lid... yes, it was snapped into two lipsticks.... Well, I like the color though. I carefully put it back in the tube...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors may not be accurate in posting
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a lavender color. The colors on my monitor might not be accurate or the picture that was posted was not accurate. I ordered Tulip Tide which in real life is pink. Since I’m not sure if the color disparity was because of my monitor I cannot in good faith ask for a refund. That said the product itself is very good and the color isn’t awful.
customer_reviews.author: HomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and smooth, but not completely flawless.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and feel, but I do have problems sometimes with bumps forming in the lipstick (likely from the natural ingredients, just doesn't look as nice in the tube) and sometimes the tube breaking. It does come off some on cups and glasses. Regardless, I like the way it looks and makes my lips feel, and it's comparable in quality to other lipsticks in this price range with better shades and ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Hayli May

customer_reviews.title: It bleeds into fine lines. OK for young girls but anyone over ...
customer_reviews.text: It bleeds into fine lines. OK for young girls but anyone over 40, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: elva veliz

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It smells great and it feels great~ However, the biggest issue is that it rubs off as easily as any lip balm or chap stick. I happen to like how easily it goes on and comes off. Make sure you take it with you, though, for touch-ups during the day. All of the colors in this line also blend very, very well with each other so you can make your own shade easily by blending.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return this item but it is not return eligible. (I could have sworn it said return eligible when I bought it.) It is very soft, I opened it last night and it is already damaged because I put the lid on it and it smooshed. Also, the color literally lasted 10 minutes even when I did not drink or eat anything :/
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fagliano

customer_reviews.title: True to color shown
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived timely. Color is pretty true to what's shown in the description. Goes on smoothly and lasts a while. You will need to reapply after eating/drinking, but that's standard with any regular lipstick. My husband loves the color on me!! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: Product worked the first few weeks then texture became gritty and rough. Do not purchase from this 3rd party as I’ve never had a problem with Burts Bees products before. Perhaps this was old stock, don’t know but don’t take a chance. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: King's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: I like this lipstick. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Juniper water and oceans orchid are my favorite two colors! They are both very flattering and although they look scary dark in the tube, they are just rich warm colors. But whatever you do, do not pay full price for them!! I have gotten juniper water for about five bucks and the oceans orchid is sometimes as low as $2.50 on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Myra Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Broken lipstick
customer_reviews.text: The bullet of the lipstick that I received was broken, it was out of place when I twisted it up and the top part was a bit shaved off. Also, most of the shades of the lipsticks I received seemed old. The lipsticks had sweat in them and the smell was pretty old.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Gritty and dry!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but after a few uses, the stick became dry and crumbly and felt like it had rough pebbles in it. I usually love Burts Bees products and have never had an issue like this before (the other color I ordered at the same time is just fine). Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not a lip color but more of a gloss.
customer_reviews.text: Does makes your lips soft but Not a lipstick! More of a dark gloss which doesn't stick to lips even right away!😩 I would recommend this as a lip moisturizer but I would get a softer color because you can see it immediately that it's not everywhere on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: empressofq

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Tubes with Great Lipstick inside
customer_reviews.text: lipsticks arrived mostly broken, ( 2 out of 3 broken) , one was intact but broke due to me dropping it (with cap closed), the caps come off all the time and the square shape is really uncomfortable- the whole lipstick tube is annoying, my least favorite ever -shape wise. One of the colors is truly amazing , I think it's called Suede Splash but i will have to melt the lipsticks and put in a different tube, the tube is truly THAT bad. So it's a good product in itself but the packaging, the lipstick tube itself is horrible to use, the worst ever.
customer_reviews.author: diana wolf

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect "my lips but better" shade for pale, neutral-or-cool toned ladies. I have fair skin and dark red hair and this immediately became my daily go-to. It's a cold and harsh winter where I live and this color is just as moisturizing and protective as my usual chapstick. The color transfers when eating/drinking and requires frequent reapplication, but with how much I need the moisture, I'm willing to deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Lid

customer_reviews.title: Product was broken
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item, received it broken up inside tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Trash! Broke off almost instantly, had a weird texture and went on too thick. Extremely unflattering and I am very disappointed as usually Burt‘s Bees has good stuff. Big beauty fail...Don‘t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Crackle

customer_reviews.title: Love that its all natural
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, perfect for my skin tone, lighter than I expected. Love that its all natural and not any harmful chemicals either. Use as frequenty as you would any other lipstick after you eat or refresh as needed. Cost effective too. Not as expensive as the department stores lipsticks. Definetely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Very pigmented moisturizing lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome moisturizing lipstick. Did not dry my lips out. Not smudge proof and had to reapply after eating or drinking, but no big deal. Lasts a really long time otherwise. Bleeds a little, not too bad, so would recommend a similar shaded lip pencil as well. (This pic is after I've used it a ton...not brand new!)
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: I Wouldn't Call it "Scarlet Soaked"...
customer_reviews.text: On me, it looked more like a bright red. Like Ariel's hair from the Little Mermaid. Not exactly my color but it is still quality lipstick. Would not recommend based off color, but would recommend based off the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Never again. Worst lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick was awful. I applied it and there were clumps of it on my lips. It wasn’t smooth. It didn’t last long at all. It went on worse than chapstick. It got all over my teeth the moment I smiled with the finished look. Absolutely worst lipstick I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Dark but elegant
customer_reviews.text: Most people might think it’s a very dark color to handle that’s why it might be the reason it’s the cheapest among all the colors. I found out it’s a very elegant color to use if you know how to touch your face foundation color with your make up. So far I love it
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Wei

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: The shade is doused rose. I took this pic about 4 hours after application. Once I ate dinner it started to come off, which is expected since it’s a moisturizing lipstick and those just never stay on as long. It’s not super heavy coverage but more than the burts bees lip shimmer. The application was smooth and the color was beautiful; I’ll be using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor O

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, but looks like my own lip Color
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of birds bees products, and I usually use their tinted lip balm. But it doesn’t last very long. This is a very nice product, and it does last longer. But the color I chose, Dusted Rose, is very similar to my own lips and looks like I’m not wearing lipstick. Otherwise, I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Heartsong09

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when I opened it and the tip had been smudged inside the cap and the lipstick was falling off the tube. But i grabbed a tissue paper and carefully put it into place. After using it you won’t notice the broken tip. Super nice colour and super moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift requested by a friend in the UK. She says Burt's Bees products are very popular there but are more expensive than in the US. She loves this and the other color I purchased for her.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: A nice, natural lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister, and she loves it. It keeps its color after application, and it moisturizes. Only downside is that it wasn't sealed or in any kind of package. Which is kind of creepy considering it could be used at any point before being sold. It should at least be shipped in a baggy if there's no box or packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ice*Nine

customer_reviews.title: I have used Burt's Bees forever
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love the tubes of lipstick. The colors are sheer and attractive. I do find myself needing to reapply often, but I think it is because I use lip balm of some sort all day and night. I will be taking this lipstick with me everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: NO SAFETY SEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I tossed this. It came with no protection around the tube! I have never received lipstick like that! Anyone could have used it and tossed it in bag and sent it. How does this happen??? My friends all said they wouldn’t have used it either and they would’ve done the same thing....thrown it away! I love Burts Bees and the color was perfect but no safety seal!
customer_reviews.author: Lianne

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite brand of lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of lipstick. I like that it is natural and doesn't contain toxins like other lipsticks. The shade of this lipstick is a soft pretty pink. It doesn't have a red hue as the name Doused Rose suggests but regardless I like it. It's perfect for an understated natural look.
customer_reviews.author: AllieLaw

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could've kept this lipstick but...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could've kept this lipstick but the smell of it was just too strong for me.. The color was a very pretty, vibrant color.. but although I love the color, I couldn't even try it on when I received it because the smell was just too overwhelming...
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good pyoduct
customer_reviews.text: I like burts bees products, but this doesn’t moisturize As much as your regular balm does. It’s also hard to figure out colors...this was darker than the stick I bought last time.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Love Burt's Bees lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a color that I truly like - I have been buying Burt's bees for quite awhile and like all the colors I have had, but really think that this color fits me the best overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Cavaliers

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick on your lips
customer_reviews.text: The color looks like it would be a solid mat lipstick, but when you put it on it is very shiny and almost wet like lipgloss. I had to reapply every half hour or it would completely come off leaving me looking like all I have on is lip liner. It came off onto everything I touched my lips to, it would not dry like I had hoped and whipped off very easly. From now on if I’m gonna by Burt’s bees then I’m just sticking to chap stick
customer_reviews.author: StonedasMedusa

customer_reviews.title: Colorful lip healer that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice way to add color to chap stick-like lip healer. When colors are added-that's a major bonus! Thank you for coming up with a attractive, colorful useful lipstick to heal our lips while helping them looking awesome! They up end feeling really soft too!
customer_reviews.author: AkBigMama

customer_reviews.title: crystalized!
customer_reviews.text: You know how honey crystalizes. Well, so does this lipstick. Took it on a trip with me to and by the time I returned it was like applying sand to your lips. Like it at first but then I didn't. Dang.
customer_reviews.author: desolis34

customer_reviews.title: Great subtle lipstick
customer_reviews.text: So i actually got this to test out their lipsticks since i like their chapsticks. Decided to try their lipsticks and I love it. It's not as opaque as regular lipsticks, but is a nice subtle color which is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I give it three stars for being natural and reasonably priced from a trusted brand. But this lipstick goes on lighter than it looks in the tube. It turned more a fuschia color on me which was surprising since it appears like a very dark wine in the tube. It was too moist and light to achieve the rich matte finish I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne O.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Need-To-Have
customer_reviews.text: I love my Burt’s Bees lipstick for several reasons but mainly because it doesn’t feel like it’s caked onto my lips like most lipsticks. It moisturizes very nicely, you do need to apply it a bit more frequently than other brands but I don’t care about that. My lips feel much healthier when I have it on as opposed to elf or Hard Candy....Blush Basin is a great neutral shade! I’d recommend this to anybody 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first got it and then it got to a level where it is gritty, like it has sand it in....so I quit using it. I have been a Burt's Bees tinted lip balm customer for years and was excited to try the lip stick. I hope they find a way to improve the "gritty" problem
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to find new makeup now that I am in my 50s. I absolutely love this lipstick. For a really good price, it is long lasting and moisturizing. The shade is great too.
customer_reviews.author: J Professor

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to department store $25-30 lipsticks!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color! The lipstick is moisturizing but stays well. I like that this lipstick is formulated without parabens & other toxic ingredients. Safe to lick your lips!
customer_reviews.author: Lena B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the dusty rose shade
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about purchasing this, but it is better than I anticipated. I would like it if it was a little creamier, but I like the color and it goes on fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Irene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the prettiest nude lipsticks I have come across! It comes off as a beautiful brown nude with pinky undertones. The payoff is lovely and it leaves my normally dry lips feeling super soft. It amazes me that this lipstick is 100% natural. I like to pair it with my Honeybee Gardens lip liner in the shade "Fantasy", which is a very affordable clean lip liner ($9)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lips lips lips
customer_reviews.text: It was smooth when I first tried it. My lips felt moist and hydrated. I’m probably going to buy another shade of this because besides the container of the lipstick, everything else that comes with it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Everything Maria

customer_reviews.title: Natural Lipstick for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife exclusively uses burts bees and typically buying natural products they are quite expensive. Couldn't believe these were so cheap so I loaded up with all of the colors and gave them to her for Christmas! Great price and even better brand! Cheaper on Amazon than any other place!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: ... was really looking forward to using this lipstick (I love Burt's Bees and I love this color)
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this lipstick (I love Burt's Bees and I love this color), but when it arrived and I popped off the cover, I looked inside and the tube was empty! Turns out the ENTIRE lipstick got stuck to the top of the cover, most likely due to all this summer heat. I can't even get the lipstick out because the cover is longer than the stick itself. I'm giving this two stars instead of one because I'm still able to apply the lipstick with a Q tip, but it's still very disappointing and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burt's Bee - 100% Natural MoisturizingLipstick  -Sunset Cruise
customer_reviews.text: Love the shade especially for my senior age and for my complexion. Will see if it will moisturized as described. Packed well and arrived as stated.
customer_reviews.author: LA MOM

customer_reviews.title: Disliked
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this lipstick for fall/winter so bad but the smear and the product quality just was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Lily Lake
customer_reviews.text: Update: After a few uses the texture became bumpy and grainy. It still goes on ok but it’s unpleasant to use now. It really helps the review if you mention what color you bought because sometimes Amazon doesn't show that info to the reader. Lily Lake is a slightly warm mauve-ish color. I like it a lot. The formula is moisturizing but stays on pretty well for a natural lipstick. Taking off one star because the tube is awkward. It doesn't spin up evenly, almost like it's slightly tilted in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Product not as represented
customer_reviews.text: Part of what I paid for was the nice gift box. That was not sent. Not happy. Berts Bees is a great product. This seller is is not.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural color and moistures your lips
customer_reviews.text: I like the natural color and the moisture it provides. You don't feel like your lips are greasy and yet you have a nice natural color on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: I got the blush basin, and the color looks pretty good! It came unbroken and new. The color glides on nicely and my lips don't feel dried out from usage.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I use this lip color under the Burt's Bees Lip Shine in Whisper and works like a charm (looks great)! I gave 4 stars instead of 5 b/c the lipstick shifts within the container, rubbing against the edges (doesn't stay put during application, even when used without too much pressure). Even so, this is not enough to keep me from purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Logan-Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a moisturizer type lipstick with a pop of color. This is extremely dry and wears off quickly. While the color is rich..with it applying so dry..it is very uncomfortable and unflattering. Dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fitch

customer_reviews.title: but these Burt's Bees lipsticks are awesome. They are very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one to my friend for her birthday, but these Burt's Bees lipsticks are awesome. They are very hydrating, pigmented, and soft. I also like the ingredients they are made of, for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It's a subtle pink that's almost passable as normal pink lip colour in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I have a yellow complexion and was looking for a more girly color since I typically wear vampy reds. It's a subtle pink that's almost passable as normal pink lip colour in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

product_meta.title: Burt’s Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lipstick, Blush Basin, 1 Tube, 0.12 Ounce (Pack of 1) (9285089437)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blush Basin| Style:1 TubeBurt’s Bees Lipsticks give you full coverage, lip color with 8 hours of moisturization. These long lasting lipsticks are available in a variety of vibrant moisturizing shades. The Blush Basin shade, in this all day lipstick, has a warm, reddish pink hue with just the right amount of lip color to enhance your dry lips while keeping them nourished and hydrated. This lipstick has a moisturizing, creamy texture that adds a vibrant shade with a smooth, satin finish. Made with 100% naturally moisturizing ingredients and a versatile color palette, these all day lipsticks deliver a luscious, bold color and help soften and condition your lips naturally. Winner of the 2016 Allure Best of Beauty Award, Burt’s Bees Lipsticks are free of parabens, phthalates, petrolatum and SLS and made with recyclable packaging. With a rich color palette from neutrals, to pinks, to reds and plums, these lipsticks are 100% natural beauty products. Burt’s Bees lipsticks make lips look and feel smooth and beautiful.

BRAND STORY
By Burt's Bees
feature_bullets: LONG LASTING LIPSTICK: Intense color with 8 hour moisture leaves lips silky smooth with a satin finish and creamy texture
MOISTURIZING LIP COLOR: This lipstick helps condition and sooth lips with moisturizing ingredients like Beeswax, Moringa Oil, Raspberry Seed Oil and Vitamin E
ALL DAY COLOR: Enhance your natural lip color wearing the gorgeous Sunset Cruise shade that's a full-coverage lipstick in a soft purple, berry hue
ALL NATURAL MAKEUP: Burt's Bees Lipsticks are 100% natural and are formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum and SLS made with recyclable packaging
18 SHADES: Winner of 2016 Allure Best of Beauty Award, this Burt's Bees Satin Lipstick comes in a variety of versatile shades that deliver luscious, bold color for everyday wear
